overview:
Brandon Soichet-Mason, is an American music entrepreneur and C.E.O. of Juxtaposed Music, a worldwide, full-service music licensing agency dedicated to gathering the greatest independent artists, bands, composers, songwriters and music producers of all genres and connecting them with music supervisors, filmmakers, TV producers, networks, advertising agencies, and interactive media creators everywhere.

He is also an accomplished record producer/mixer/engineer and music supervisor with RIAA Gold and Platinum-selling album and film soundtrack releases to his credit. Credits include Shooter Jennings, 101 Crustaceans, Secret Machines, The Runaways Soundtrack, Across The Universe Soundtrack, The Tempest Soundtrack, Public Enemies Soundtrack, David Bowie, Don Byron, Shivaree, Carli Munoz, VHS or Beta, The Zutons, New Order, Joan Baez, Dar Williams, Martha Wainwright, Joan Jett and many more.
